title: Licence-raj continues: Planning house party with alcohol in Noida? Apply for occasional bar licence
selftext: This is ridiculous. Whatâ€™s in it for consumers? Just more ways to loot peopleâ€™s hard-earned, heavily-taxed moneyðŸ˜¡
comments: Maharashtra has similar rules. No one follows them.

That won't stop governments from *selectively* applying them. If you tweet against your CM for example, and during the investigation if the cops find out that you regularly host booze parties, this law will be the perfect excuse to take you to the lockup.
Exactly. Laws enforced selectively is a secret weapon.
